name: Isometric World
description: Sin descripción

name: Knowledge Challenge
description: This game helps you entertain after stressful working hours. We bring you quizzes on many topics such as: Books, Movies, Music... There are 3 levels of play for each topic. The puzzle database is updated regularly. We are still working to bring more game modes. Have fun!

name: Animal Puzzle for Toddlers and Kids
description: Easy to use puzzles for ages two and up. Featuring funny and cute animal motifs with 30 unique puzzles. 100% frustration free and child-safe.

name: Yuki and Rina Football
description: Yuki & Rina are 2 young talented football players. They showed incredible football skills and their coach and manager decided it was time to train them to become Pro Players in the famous “Soccer stars Major Football League”. Before becoming Pro Players, Yûki & Rina must pass the ultimate test, which is a combination of agility, skills and reflex.

name: Traffic Safety: Air Scrambled Hard
description: This game is used to educate everyone on the importance of traffic safety. Pilot the plane carefully to avoid the birds on the route. The DLC will adjust the game's difficulty to Hard mode from the 31st mission.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Industrial Switching
description: Somewhere in Canada, in the city of Longview, offers a challenging industrial park that will challenge the train crews critical thinking skills to navigate and properly spot the freight cars. Industrial Switching is an industrial themed route servicing 15 industries.

name: Paranoya
description: This is a liminal horror game where you are sent to supernatural dimensions, you must defeat the demon and his workers though multiple levels to escape and go back to your normal life.

name: Putinator
description: The Russian army tried to clone their leader, thus resulting in a never ending mindless horde of Putin zombies... In this retro inspired shooter you take the role of a soldier sent as clean up crew to a town on the outskirts of Chernobyl, with one mission. Kill all Putin zombies.

name: Treefender
description: Relive your childhood in Treefender: a VR-exclusive 4 player online co-op game where you build your own treefort and defend it against an alien invasion!

name: Knights of the Deep
description: Knights of the Deep is an online, action-packed arena fighting game with crustaceans. Choose your favorite brawler from the seas and duke it out against each other using a variety of weapons and special abilities. Each crustacean has a unique playstyle, learn them all and climb the hierarchy!

name: BPM Boy
description: BPM Boy is a physics-based platformer, with influences from games like Marble Madness, Super Monkey Ball, deBlob and Crystal Castles. BPM Boy features multiple routes, hidden secrets, and an original soundtrack driven by RetroNinja's Dynamic Music & Sound Regulator (DMSR). The funky grooves change and react to how you play.

name: Arbiter
description: Arbiter is an intense, multiplayer arena shooter in VR. Blast yourself around the battle grid with an assortment of weapons in destructible environments. Each round is a new arbitration with players representing a side procedurally decided upon by the all-powerful Arbiter AI.

name: ColdFortune
description: Coldfortune is a third-person survival adventure game from developer Frostware. Its exploration sequences use fixed-camera perspectives for a moody view of the world ahead, and when the action heats up, expect dangerous gunplay and cinematic hand-to-hand QTE combat.

name: Amma: Chronicles of Lost Stars
description:
Inspired by the mythology and culture of the Dogon, an ethnic indigenous group in Mali, Amma: Chronicles of Lost Stars is an Afrofantasy action-adventure role-playing game with a focus on story and exploration.

The central character in the game is Aya, a teenage weaver from the village of Jûlaya who sees her destiny shift radically when she is chosen by God Nommo as the Guardian to prevent the destruction of the world.

Amma: Chronicles of Lost Stars will feature a diverse set of locations, characters, demons, and bosses, with strategic, dynamic combat that fuses magic, martial arts, and melee weapons.

name: Ninjaman
description: Ninjaman is an 8-bit platformer street brand game where you throw love at zombies to turn them into homies and no one ever really gets hurt or dies. Because there is a Ninja With A Gold Chain. Are you the one? Can you help Ninjaman save Atlantokyo and throw the best party ever?!

name: Skies of Blue: Remake
description: Skies Of Blue Remake is a First Person Puzzle Platformer in that you go from level to level. Collect all Collectables, complete all levels and build your own in the custom level editor!

name: X-Plane 11: Skyline Simulations - KAST: Astoria Regional Airport
description: Fly above Astoria and enjoy the night view with perfect landmarks like the Astoria Column, the Light House and the famous Megler Bridge!

name: Pixies 'n Crafts
description:
Pixies 'n Crafts is a 2D platform game with crafting elements.

In it you take on the role of the King, who deploys his energy in the form of adorable creatures to help you escape a terrible monster.

Deep in an unknown universe, there was this monster, which devoured all the matter that was in front of it. He was insatiable, and she never stopped eating. After an era of destruction, unable to take it anymore, something that could perhaps be called “the good essence” of the creature to separate itself from this entity and escaped inside, creating its own world, where its other part would find it. This planet was totally different from the others, there was life, and life cooperated with the development of this planet. Then the creator creature split into several parts, giving way to an intelligent civilization that would further prosper this place. The monster spent years hunting this part and the planet, as it was weakened without its other part.

name: Bag Boy Memory
description: A Playdate remake of Sonic Advance's memory minigame

name: Tim Tooth
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Kenya
description: Puzzles of Kenya!

name: Tanima
description: Tanima is a 2D action-roguelite deckbuilder with a heavy load of story-telling and exploration. Build your world with cards. Fight enemies. Meet new friends. Upgrade your character. Talk with TAnima. Go through the Last Doors to escape the dungeon!

name: Terminal Madness: The Awakening
description: Terminal Madness 2 Awakening is the sequel and continues the story of Crypto, who tries to achieve his dream and become the greatest hacker in the world. Help Crypto to overcome all odds and immerse yourself in this fun, classic styled point and click adventure game.

name: The Legend of the Soulforce: Heroes of the Abyss
description: Heroes of the Abyss is an RPG featuring deep character customization and advanced combat mechanics. You will evolve in a universe plunged into the night by the god Asteros. Discover Asteros' dark motives and plans as you adventure through the abyss that has opened up in the world

name: The Questing
description: The Questing is an action-RPG game set in the fantasy world. You can grow by hunting enemies using various weapons and skills that you like. Also, feel free to explore the wide world, discover new towns and cities, and take quests from NPCs around the world to solve them.

name: MadVentures
description: MadVentures is a game about exploration and survival in a world created by players like you.

name: Lustful Pussies
description: In Lustful Pussies, you play in third person as John, who has fallen asleep and is dreaming. In this dream, he is the hero of a real action movie! He has to take the Dildo Gun and shoot back from the crowds of excited women who want to beat and fuck William.

name: Long Drop
description: By the power of POOP! Solve challenging puzzles in this medieval-themed casual puzzler. Unlock new poops and harness their power to overcome the challenges of the Long Drop.

name: Life is Paradise
description: "Life is Paradise" is an RPG life management simulation game with a high degree of freedom, where you can build your own village, breed livestock, venture into mines, and make friends with all kinds of people! As the protagonist, you can do whatever you want here!

name: Jousting VR
description: Welcome to medieval times. Times of Jousting. You take part in a grand tournament competing with other knights, for fame, glory, wealth and to win the king's niece's heart. “To risk life to save a smile on a face of a woman or a child is the secret of chivalry.”

name: Panty Load
description: Casual arcade gameplay with a twist! You want, no you need to get off. Can you avoid life's obstacles for the ultimate reward. Get your load into your panty by any means necessary! Humorous in game achievements! Multiple visual endings not for the faint of heart! Don't take life so seriously!

name: Parabellum Galaxia
description: Prepare for war in this VR Space Strategy Simulator. Design your ships, complete your missions, defeat your enemy.

name: Plasmatic
description: Plasmatic is a virtual space in which our society has been closed with its own approval. We wake up from it unexpectedly. Our goal is to repair the main simulation core of Plasmatic. The continuation of life lived in it before will not be possible without the reparation…

name: Kotiro
description: Kotiro is an adult game in the Souls-like genre.The earth has been obliterated by evil. To save the human race, a brave fighter has established a system to boost the power of humans through a power selection system.

name: Last of Humanity
description: Welcome to Last of Humanity, an online open-world sandbox multiplayer zombie survival game. Travel the zombie wasteland as you attempt to rebuild society controlling key locations to manufacture & produce equipment for survival. Forage, Craft and shoot your way to survival from the dead and living.

name: Heaven's Fox
description: After a staunch materialist boy witnesses the ghosts and spirits, how will his world view be shaken? The nine-tailed fox who is high above, the classmates who laugh and play, the mysterious girl in the dream, which one of them would you like to start a thrilling and exciting adventure with?

name: The Witch Blade
description: An exciting classic adventure in the world of dark fantasy with honed game mechanics, memorable enemies, and retro aesthetics.

name: Stack by Stack
description: Stack by stack is a tower defense game where you have to stop evil cunning robots from stealing the core! Craft towers from enemy robot parts, Printing new metal parts for towers on 3D printers, Mining ore, Shooting. Almost all objects in the game can be carried in a stack on your hands

name: Spintales
description: The world has succumbed to the curse of gold. You too, start to feel the drag of it... Can you cleanse the world of the curse, once and for all? Pick up your sword and shield, and venture into a unique roguelike adventure!

name: Incarnation
description: A story driven action RPG, solving the mystery of who you truly are.

name: Smiths & Legends
description: Smiths & Legends is a top-down co-op Blacksmithing RPG. Craft recipes within the time limit with your friends while defending your shop from monsters. Go through the 60+ levels, fight monsters and bosses, and level up your party!

name: Junior Solutions
description: Junior Solutions us a Sci Fi 3D graphic adventure. Where the player will travel in the multiverse solving conflicts of the different civilizations that inhabit each world and making hard choices along the way resolving mind bending puzzles.

name: Sunny Grove
description: A panda parent in a colorful adventure! Your babies are too young to realize the dangers of the forest. As a parent it is your task to get them home before they get hurt (and before dinner!)

name: Penguins Can Fly
description: An indie penguin simulation game where you upgrade your igloo to make it the coolest igloo ever, create power stations on the outskirts of your island to generate power and money, and eventually launch yourself to the moon to prove that penguins can indeed fly!

name: Topo Mix Game
description: Only you can help Yuri Dimitrov regain his lost honor in this 8-bit adventure.

name: The Trials of Beadie
description: The Trials Of Beadie is a 2D side scrolling platformer that relies on precision playing mechanics such as run, jump, wall jump, dash, fast fall, hover, and wall grab. Play for fun or speed run as fast as you can. You can die as many times as you like, but there are no save points and no continues.

name: The Bastonnes
description: The Bastonnes is an action, strategy game taking place in a fictional atmosphere of the 20s. Play members of a family and fight against each other ! One goal, be the last at the table !

name: Ned Kelly: Armored Outlaw
description: This game is an alternate history themed FPS. Based on Ned Kelly, an Australian outlaw in the 1880s. It all kicks off where the real gang met their end. Can you survive the initial police raid at Glenrowan?

name: Space Shells
description: Space Shells is a roguelike Sci-Fi VR game with stunning graphics where you have to break into spaceships and make clever use of your shells to complete the tasks.

name: It's Full of Stars
description: It's Full of Stars is a Battle Royale game in which you fight for a ridiculous enormous amount of gold and power... oh! and also for surviving. Basically only the winner lives... Definitely not based on any korean tv shows or other similar games.

name: Solitons
description: Inspired in mega drive shmups and mathematical physics. Control kdV an artificial intelligence and destroy all humans.

name: Land of Viewers
description: Sin descripción

name: Panta Rhei
description: As Chaos threatens to tear the flow of time apart, Phi, a reluctant Guardian of Time, embarks on a journey to the Origin of Time. Equipped with the ability to bend time, they face hostile creatures, solve puzzles and explore the Realm of Time in an adventure rogue-like where time is your weapon.

name: Army Driver
description: Sin descripción

name: Stunt Destroyer
description: Sin descripción

name: Earth Brigades
description:
Aliens are invading earth!
You must take control of the troops and hold the defense line against the attackers.
Earth Brigades is a single player arcade game that will challenge your quick reflexes as well as your ability to strategize, adapt & plan ahead.

name: Repairny
description: "Repairny" is First-person perspective action game. Repairny and drones are constantly attacking to player with light sword or laser gun. Control player direction to guard with player's light sword. Then attack with your light sword. Destroy all of enemy in field to clear stage.

name: Restaurant Simulator
description: This is a realistic virtual Restaurant where you can order food and chat. Interested in having the restaurant experience from your home? Eat, order, chat and have server wait on you and bring your food.

name: Reckless Driver
description: Forget about bustling traffic as you race your way through the streets of Seaview in Reckless Driver!

name: Purrrfect Love
description: Sometimes she's naughty and sometimes she's cute... sometimes she's sexy and enthralling to boot. Create your own story of true, throbbing love... A beautiful, visual novel of love... straight from the soul. You're just dying to get those heartstrings plucked, aren't you?

name: PumPum: +5 Girls Pack
description: This DLC adds 5 more girls to the game!

name: Project: The MIR Incident
description: Escape from a wide laboratory dominated by battles between rebelling test subjects and armed scientists. Solve puzzles, get into battles, and discover secrets as you progress through this action-packed 2D-Sidescroll-Adventure.

name: Project: Maidenless
description: Scavenge for loot in an unforgiving world filled with other players and monstrosities that mean you harm! Craft great Weapons, Armors and Utilities using the resources gathered in Raid to grow stronger. Enter the Great Arena and fight other players in structured 1v1, 3v3 and 5v5 PvP!

name: Mist
description: Mist is a survival mystery game set in a world that was suddenly enveloped by a deep fog that somehow spawns strange monsters that try to kill you. The goal is to fight, unravel the mysteries behind the catastrophe and to forge relationships with the last survivors.

name: Nude in the Castle
description: Nude In The Castle is a third person game where you play as a sexy girl who is trying to save her castle from perverts. Armed with a sharp ax, cut and kill the dirty perverts who have captured this castle.

name: Meat Beating: The Second Coming
description: Seriously all you do is beat your meat.

name: Mini Star Fishing
description: Have a relaxing time catching cute and colorful fish with fully controllable fishing rod. Upgrade your character and buy better boats. Buy a spaceship and head into space to fishing in space. Or, buy a submarine and go fishing in the deep sea. And fill the fish DEX.

name: Mine Clash
description: Blow 'em up or get blown up in Mine Clash! One match finishes in around 6 minutes. Taking over resources on the map for your team. Pinning down enemies with your vehicle firepower and teamwork strategies to win.

name: Miko Melee
description: Fight monsters and keep the village safe!

name: Might'n Mow'em
description: Might'n Mow'em is a multiplayer coop Bullethell experience, flavored with established RPG elements, and wrapped in a rogue-lite progression system. Fight your way through ever-growing monster hordes, upgrade your character class long-term, and hunt for epic loot.

name: MetaCard: The Turing Test
description: We have made changes in the differentiation of roles. Only one role has an armor, and the other roles have their unique defense means. And the roles will be very different. Unexpectedly, the energy of one role will not be restored every round. How does he fight?

name: Goddess of Card War 2: DLC-1
description: A new card character can be purchased in the shop: Yulou Skill: Cool Down Deals 1.75 times the damage to all enemies and reduces the rage of all enemies by 5.

name: Forever Alone
description: Travel through a handcrafted world as a young kitten looking for comfort after a tragedy occurs by looking into another reality, revealing various paths to get past obstacles!

name: Volcanic Core
description: Thrilling vehicle combat within a musical universe! Face fierce pilots & reach a near unbeatable boss... Train to improve your skills or venture in very diverse challenge areas.

name: Symbiotic
description: Symbiotic is an RPG Visual Novel hybrid centered around a school of children training to fight a war against another world. These brave students are given man-made symbiotes to fight the evil alien symbiotes that attach themselves to living beings. The question is, will Earth Survive?

name: Goddess of Card War 2: DLC-2
description: A new card character can be purchased in the shop: Manli Skill: Eliminate Deal 1.5 times damage to a single enemy. If the enemy's HP is lower than 30%, kill it directly.

name: Roast Together
description: A casual game that relies on your drag-and-drop hand speed and simple strategic decisions.

name: Ranchlife
description: There are a lot of farming simulations. But Ranchlife stands out with special features. A day/night system has been implemented to provide additional realism. Grow seeds, harvest vegetables and sell them at your own stall in town.

name: Estranged: Arctic Cold
description: Estranged: Arctic Cold follows the story of a fisherman stranded in a mysterious Arctic facility. Experience the rich environments as you venture deeper, and uncover the secrets of the Arctic Cold.

name: Escape the Ether
description: Struggle your way through a gauntlet of 100 intense tests of platforming skills, in this ultimate love letter to the genre. And all this with the use of one hand? Simple to play, impossible to master.

name: Escape Abstraction
description: Escape Abstraction lets you (re)discover 7 abstract paintings in a first person puzzle game. Recompose the painting to escape!

name: Covid Killer
description: Covid killer is a FPS-Survival game in real time (3D UE4) in first person. You will have to face hordes of aggressive viruses that you will have to eradicate thanks to the vaccine darts contained in your rifle and make the best scores.

name: Crazyness: Weird Village
description: First-person action game

name: Command Line Mazer
description: Command Line Mazer is a casual strategy game using Unix-like command-line interface. You will command virus to gather resources while avoiding being caught by anti-virus.

name: Come Home.
description: Top down pixelated story about desperation and betrayal.

name: Iron Evil
description: A roguelite where you traverse a factory run by an evil corperation, equip yourself with the best of parts (that hardly have any defects!) and fight your way to the end. However the parts you don't equip the factory applies elsewhere...

name: Cultist Astronaut
description: Blast through this cultic platformer as a space-faring cultist hellbent on purging the galaxy of heretics! Travel to hazardous planets across the cosmos and eliminate opposing cults with your eldritch blaster.

name: CubeShooter
description: this is a tower defence game, character cant move,but you can choose your weapon,and your evolution way and get special result ， randomn map, random weapon and random enemies; we add some roguelite elements and character can get permanent upgrade.

name: Cryptorig
description: CryptoRIG is a semi-idle server management game focussed on cryptocurrency mining and trading.

name: Cyra and the Beacon Path
description: Join Cyra on an intergalactic mission to find her father in this challenging platformer. Journey through seven distinctive and captivating worlds, encounter diverse and quirky new lifeforms, and unravel the mystery of Dr. Kallis’ disappearance.

name: Dancin Divas
description: A robbery has taken place! Four Diva's from around the world are showcasing their treasures at the local lounge but things have gone south. It's time to fight back!

name: Defend the Bits TD
description: An awesome 3D tower defence game created to give you days and days of the most fun TD game in town. Defend from hordes of Blocks with your mighty BIT heroes! armed with bows, axes, cannons and even frying pans.

name: Delegati Genesis
description: A cyberpunk fantasy RPG.

name: Desktop Hacker
description: A narrative driven hacking game that takes you on a journey around murky hacking circles. You will be using the console and graphical tools to hack systems in order to profit and advance the storyline.

name: Despectum Drakone
description: Despectum Drakone is a turn-based RPG game about rejection and obsession. Equipment can be upgraded with Glyphs and bordures. Humans and agrestes can be recruited as allies during the adventure. The music and artwork are original, created exclusively for Despectum.

name: Detective: The Mountain City
description: You are a detective who newly arrived in the mountain city, helping the local police to solve the crime. You need to be able to use your powers of deduction to find the killers and bring them to justice. Enjoy your trip to the mountain city.

name: Dis Pontibus 2
description: A single-player game set in a archipelago full of puzzles.

name: Dominion: Prosperity - 1st Edition
description: Play with classic cards in this set that were included in the original release of Prosperity.

name: Dunkeep
description: Combat. Cooking. Crafting. This and so much more in Dunkeep, a casual RPG adventure game mixed with life-sim elements where at night you fight your way through endless dungeons collecting everything you need to run your very own tavern during the day.

name: Eden Remains: Arrival
description: Eden Remains: Arrival is a Sci-fi First Person Action-Survival game. You play an elite dropship trooper sent to investigate a distress signal at a remote research facility on Eden. Fight, gather resources, manage vitals and craft supplies to stay alive.

name: E-circle
description: Sin descripción

name: Echo's Climb
description: Echo's Climb is a challenging, 3D adventure platformer. You'll explore a kingdom frozen in stone, ascend the various locales and collect echoes of the past, all to hopefully return these lands to their former glory.

name: Do You Want More!?
description: Play as Lloyd Arch, the young private detective known for being total dick, and unravel the mystery of the Black Scar Serial Killer in this visual novel adventure, but remember that the truth tends to hurt the most.

name: Down Fast VR
description: Ride mountain bike at crazy speed in VR. Down Fast VR puts you behind the bars of a fast mountain bike beast. Go through technical, full of stunts and at high speed mountain trails. Use your controllers and headset to steer, lean, spin, flip and many more. Try to stay in control and be the fastest!

name: Catastrophe
description: Catastrophe is survival horror dungeon crawler. Try not to get lost in the labyrinth as you choose to slay the dungeon's inhabitants or sneak past as many as you can.

name: Chaos War
description: Sin descripción

name: Chess vs. Chat
description: Allow your chatters to actively participate and engage with your chess stream simply by typing the moves they would like to see in the chat. :) All without the use of 3th party applications. Includes a highscore, match history, twitch emotes, twitch bot, auto moderating and tons of customization.

name: City of Gangsters: Shadow Government
description: Control city politicians and manipulate laws in New York and beyond, in the new expansion pack City of Gangsters: Shadow Government.

name: Click Lovers
description: Make full use of your fingers to interact with beautiful girls in various ways~

name: Unpetrified
description: Play as a sweet, curious stone creature, experience different emotions and see, hear, and feel how the world changes around you. Explore a world filled with flora and fauna, where you interact with your surroundings in unique ways in this single-player narrative adventure.

name: Vicious Growth
description: Action RPG Roguelike. Evolve your abilities and push yourself through a procedurally generated level. Think hard about your choices, itemize well and use your skills to reach the end.

name: Wars Across the World: Curupayti 1866
description: This is the complete coverage of the 5 years of the Triple Alliance War opposing Paraguay to the coalition of Argentina, Brazil and Uruguay. e Paraguay strives to capture disputed territories, and then hold them against its powerful neighbours.

name: Wolves on the Westwind: The Vampire of Havena
description: The Vampire of Havena is a analog solo adventure that you can play without a master or teammates. Take on the role of a stray who grew up and was born in Havena. Set the new challenges and use all your skills to survive!

name: WipeOuters
description: A first-person horror game with action elements where you and your friends must "wipe" the houses finding all the infected in the area before they find you.

name: Whore Dealer
description: Whore Dealer is a puzzle game, you only need to swap the bricks to restore the pictures. The game support cheating mode and browsing pictures with one hand so that you can unlock all pictures in just one minute.

name: Blitz Roads
description: Blitz Roads is a futuristic action-packed vehicle combat racing world. Compete in numerous racing tracks with 6 different ways to play. - And test your racing skill with “Challenge Mode”. Start your engines. Ready. Set. Let’s Play!

name: Blitz in the Paper Kingdom
description: Blitz in the Paper Kingdom is an indie tower defense game, set in a pop-up sketch book. Players can place automated towers while controlling a character to defeat enemies and defend the king's statues.

name: Biters & Bullets
description: Kill thousands of zombies, collect loot, and become a lean mean killing machine! Battle and survive hordes of monsters in this high octane casual game with rogue-lite elements. Defeat bosses, hot-wire cars and stack power-ups to infinity. How long will you survive?

name: Blastboard: Casso
description: Adds a character named ‘Casso’ into the game.

name: Binary Run
description: The Reformat is inevitable. The Virus Spreads. Keep Running. Binary Run is a fast paced retro shooter inspired by 80s synthwave and retro shooters. Kill, collect and run your way through a corrupted digitial world, Keep Running.

name: BioCrisis: Return 2 the Lab
description: The alert has been given, the virus is on the loose, you've escaped the lab, the city will be nuked!

name: Bargue
description: Bargue is an online role-playing game with 12 people. You can be a good customer, a bad mafia, or a neutral thief. To survive each round, you must convince the opponent with voice chat. At the end of the day, the surviving team wins!

name: Babysitter Simulator
description: Babysitter Simulator is a casual game which prepares you for mature life! Your mission seems simple at first sight, but it is not so.

name: Buccaneers: Shipshape
description: Beat-‘em-up action on the high seas! Slip into the role of one of four fearless pirates and hack-and-slash your way through waves of enemy hordes, offshore and on a dangerous island in the Caribbean!

name: Boxman Adventures
description: Boxman Adventures is a fun platformer game about a friendly box-headed creature. Complete various levels in various different environments, including forests and deserts.

name: Boom!
description: Oh no, you have lost your legs! Use your sci-fi gun to rocket jump your way up, but be careful; one wrong move and you might just fall right to where you started.

name: Bunker 22
description: You are a geneticist who woke up in a forest house. Everyone you knew has turned into bloodthirsty zombies, the world is dying out and a secret experiment is to blame. The only way to prevent disaster is to go to an underground laboratory to create a cure and save those who are still alive

name: Burn Depth
description: Burn Depth is an underwater, exploration-focused horror game. Master a varied tool set, uncover the secrets of an underwater world, and survive an unwelcoming environment humanity was never meant to see.

name: Wuscar
description: Wuscar is a thrilling FPS Multiplayer experience. Collect weapons, Upgrade your Robotic limbs and become the strongest Wuscar known to man.

name: Animal Sanctuary
description: Create a beautiful nature refuge for all kinds of animals to come and relax in. Give them enough food, water and some toys to play with and see if you can get all the animals to show up!

name: Zaxterion: Space Frenzy!
description: Welcome to a high adrenaline arcade space game that offers very addictive and fast paced action! Zaxterion brings 80's old school goodness to modern times for the young and old alike!

name: Boku to Kare no Kiken na Doukyo Seikatsu
description: Sin descripción

name: Swallow
description: Swallow is a first-person psychological horror game with a heavy focus on story and exploration. Based on a true story, describe an unsolved case that took place on an isolated island of 20th century England. Players take control of a lighthouse keeper to uncover the truth.

name: Aitta: Finnish folktales
description: Explore and experience the old, lost Finnish folk stories.

name: Airdrift
description: Casual survival game where you build and fly your own airship, explore flying islands, craft tools, farm crops and more.

name: Accursed
description: Accursed is a first-person psychological horror game. Explore a mysterious ever-changing house in a slow-paced, atmospheric world and survive long enough to discover its terrible secret... if you dare.

name: 2Pupp
description: This game features more than 30 levels that feature platforming challenges.

name: Sentinel Attack
description: Sentinel Attack will have you play as both Justin and Erica in horizontal shooter and metroidvania stages as you battle in space and explore the many levels of the Sentinel station.

name: Alpha Pairs
description: Dr. Atoz is your host in this fun test of memory matching and spelling. Watch out for Alphy who is always hungry for letters.

name: Respawn
description: You're a clone of Kane Hartman. You woke up to take part in an AI driven experiment to find the source of the human will to survive. Fight your way through countless robotic opponents and break free from the maze!

name: Arafinn Kontor
description: The Arafinn Kontor is the central hub of the Arafinn Universe. Arafinn is a dark high-fantasy world full of epic tales and legends. Dwarves, elves, humans, giants, the orcish Uturi, and many other beings inhabiting a world in constant change, full of war, conflicts, and unexpected alliances.

name: Touhou Blooming Soul
description: A classic pixel side-scrolling action game with Rogue-lite. Play as Hata no Kokoro on a journey of self-discovery and use combinations of different emotions to fight battles as beautiful as a dance!

name: Lore
description: Lore is a stealth horror game about finding your missing grandfather while avoiding a mysterious man hunting you in the woods. Try to outsmart and avoid an adaptive AI and save your grandfather from wherever he is hiding.

name: Hell Green Blue
description: terrible creatures that are the guardians of the infernal color, destroy the guardians and save the world from the dominance of the red color!

name: L'Avancée du Désert
description: Sin descripción

name: GoVenture Entrepreneur
description: The most realistic small business startup and operations simulation ever!

name: Freeway Fiasco
description: Freeway Fiasco is a time-bending puzzle game. Control one car at a time in the same timeline. Your choices can set off a ripple effect with surprising interactions - past, present and future.

name: Starswirl Academy
description: A visual novel demo based on ponies.

name: Dungeon Liberator
description: Dungeon Liberator is a game where eight or two players face off in 1v1 rounds, with the goal to be the last player standing. Players need to compete with opponents for Minions and attack orders. Reaction speed will become as important as tactical ability.

name: Dejar Ir: A Pandemic Soulful Tale
description: An intimate and sentimental game where the story is told through different works of art that evoke what we felt during the pandemic, culminating with one of the most beautiful feelings. What will it be? An adventure filled with emotions we experienced during the pandemic.

name: I've Seen Everything: Birds
description: This DLC contains questions for the "Birds" category.

name: Prize Fighter: Remastered
description: Sin descripción

name: Albert and Puzzle Mansion
description: Albert's cat has been abducted! Enter the mansion and solve puzzles in order to find and rescue the cat!

name: Jumanji: The Curse Returns - Winter Resort
description: Play Jumanji in the Winter Resort Map and banish jungle creatures in a snowy wonderland! Add two characters and tokens to your collection and face a whole new riddle!

name: Aim God
description: A shooting simulator that maximize your aiming skills and speed up your reflexes.

name: Our Dying World
description: A fully voice-acted RPG where your choices will determine the ending. Discover why magic is slowly fading from Elorant and see how many of your friends you can save by the end.

name: Crush Them!
description: In the quiet and peaceful grassland, a group of uninvited guests suddenly came! They are ordered by Satan to raid the walls of God! You have been hired by the gods as a new warrior, sworn to live and die with the city wall! Now, follow the will of God and crush them with your fingers!

name: Shackles of Ellswyn
description: You've fallen into a weird world where men don't belong and are hunted down to become slaves. Will you submit or escape?

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: Construction Chaos
description: 2 Brand New Tables with online leaderboards and unlockable cosmetics! Construction site themed tables with an emphasis on Drop & Stationary Targets.

name: Project M
description:
Project M is an interactive movie style game with branching paths based on quick time events, choices made during gameplay or in cutscenes and items carried by the character. The game is still in development with third person shooter sections shown at GBC 2023.

It is being developed in Unreal Engine 5 by NCSoft working with scanned data for detailed environments and objects along with machine learning AI technologies used for NPC voices and facial movements.

name: Run4YourLight
description: Spirits of Run4YourLight need your help to accomplish their destiny. Join the fight and help your favorite spirit!

name: Regular Strategy Game
description: Regular Strategy Game is strategy puzzle game built around the idea of combining aspects from a board game and a turn based combat videogame. Will you be able to figure out the right moves to beat each challenge?

name: Dream Catcher VR
description: Dream Catcher VR is a relaxing puzzle adventure in the soulful world of Nappia – the land of dreams. Meet characters from varied backgrounds and shape their dreams – search for hidden parts, mend fractured memories, clear your path, and bring colors to the surroundings.

name: Skeletons vs Nadia
description: Skeletons vs Nadia is a third person game with beautiful graphics! In this game you have to play as a naked girl Nadya, who needs to get out of the cursed forest. There are a lot of lustful skeletons in this forest who want to kill you!

name: Android Simulator
description: Android Simulator is a futuristic FPS game in which you take the role of an android who is in charge of a spaceship colony. Keep a firm hand on the flight route and manage the right water balance for plants, oxygen level, and spacecraft parameters to securely deliver the colonizers.

name: Slime Jumper Adventure
description: Slime Jumper Adventure is a 2D platformer game where you are tasked with guiding the main character through multiple different levels of creative obstacles that increase in difficulty the further you get.

name: Maze Runner
description: You start the game as a cyborg, lost in the world of the Maze. He will need to find and collect all the orbs that will unlock the door to his freedom. He will have fifteen minutes to do so, before he gets lost forever. Complete mazes as third-person shooter. Eliminated over 40 different enemies.

name: Pixelshire
description: Build the town of Pixelshire and grow your community in a unique RPG sandbox which mixes life sim elements with town building, exploration, and combat. Express yourself by planning the town to your liking, master trades, get to know your neighbours, and explore the continent of Arcadia.

name: THE Bass Fishing
description: We've recreated rod and reel controls, the joy of fishing, with the Joy-Con! The realistic graphics make you feel like you're really there, letting you enjoy real bass fishing anytime, wherever you are! Don't worry if you're new to bass fishing, either!…

name: Mechanic Battle
description: Pimp up your ride and snatch the title of the best car mechanic during the Mechanic Battle Tournament!

name: Boxerpunk Stories
description: Boxerpunk Stories is a Story based 2D Pixel Art Game.

name: Beach Girls: Don't Lie in Summer
description: Lying is not a good thing to do, especially in love. So behave well and be sincere as well as quick in giving your answers.

name: Beach Boys: The Perfect Date
description: Lying is not the best way to win a boy's heart. So behave well and be sincere as well as quick in giving your answers.

name: Striker Modes
description: Nothing can overcome the adventure through the air, I enjoy the challenge in different types of planes!!!

name: Horse Stable: Herd Care Simulator
description: Go to the horse farm and get ready for adventures, quests, fights with predators and the opportunity to create a whole herd of horses!

name: Ocean Animals Puzzle for Kids & Toddlers
description: The perfect game for little kids and babies! No language skills required! Preschool & learning with fun!

name: 2 Cats & 1 Dog
description:
"2 Cats & 1 Dog" is a bundle including;
- Chubby Cat
- .Dog
- .Cat Milk

name: Airport CEO: Vintage
description: Sin descripción

name: Behind the Frame: The Finest Scenery - Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Yuzusoft Collection
description: Sin descripción

name: Souldiers: Digital Deluxe Edition
description: Souldiers - Deluxe Edition contains base game, the original soundtrack and the artbook.

name: Card Shark: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: We Took That Trip
description: A chill narrative experience through procedural and relaxing landscapes. Appreciate the reunion with your best friends, explore the road and it's fantastic things. Turn the radio on, it's time to enjoy this emotional ride.

name: June
description: June is a modern fable, presented in the form of an exploration-based puzzle platformer. It’s an emotional experience designed with a humanistic approach, that looks at the hero’s journey as an internal struggle between the individual and the collective.

name: Hiboka
description: Hiboka, a single player survival horror video game based on folklore from Madagascar and set around the middle of the 20th century.

name: Grot Slasher
description: Upgrade your character and try to survive in an endless maze filled with scary creatures. Smash all the items on the level so that the souls that have been hiding there for several hundred years get out of them, and move further along the dungeon.

name: Ragedanger Earth
description: Ragedanger Earth - Demons and evil spirits have rebelled! Grab your gun and take out the vicious creatures in this roguelike first-person shooter!

name: Pro Games Player
description:
A Plug & Play console with a built-in NES-analog chip (famiclone), which comes with a 72 in 1 multicart with unlicensed NES games, and also with the following 51 games, made for famiclones, built-in:

Hitting Mices
Exist
Cute Fish
Corr Idor

name: Changkabang
description: Enter the bustling city of "New Bilsmando", filled with abstract wonders and critters as far as the eye can see. Unfortunately, it's not all wonderful for the "Chang Gang", a compact group of rookie hover-boarding rebels.

name: PaperPlane
description: This is a small game that simulates the whereabouts of paper planes. Avoid obstacles by controlling the direction of falling and get high scores.

name: Stellar Space
description: Stellar Space is a new take on a classic arcade game with a modern, rogue-like, form for new players to enjoy!

name: Bionic Tadpole
description: A run-n-gun, non-stop action platformer-shooter! Pick up a weapon. A jetpack. A force shield. All while evading bullet-hell madness! Oh, and be mindful not to let your gun overheat...

name: Yuonger Adventure
description: A hardcore platformer for fans of challenging games. Your adventure will begin in an unknown man-made zone full of traps, electricity and magicians. Try to collect as many energy balls as possible and avoid falling into the clutches of enemies!

name: The Roots
description: In this game you gonna explore Townique.

name: Psyolence
description: Psyolence is an arcade hardcore top-down slasher with neon graphics.

name: The Walker
description: The Walker is a single-player survival horror game. Find out the truth behind what is happening while surviving the zombies. Feel the tension and fight your fear because they await you!

name: Evil's Den
description: Evil's Den: Forsaken Dungeon is a rogue-lite dungeon crawler featuring procedurally generated levels where you will battle through hordes of monsters to close a portal to Hell opened in the village's church.

name: Hero of War
description: Hero of War is a platform game where every move must be very well thought out, wasting a single shot can put your entire mission at risk.

name: Escape from Tarkov: Arena
description:
Escape from Tarkov Arena is a standalone game project - a session-based multiplayer first-person shooter for PC with all the known and beloved hardcore game mechanics of Escape from Tarkov.
Players will take part in gladiatorial battles in various arenas of the city of Tarkov, organized by a mysterious group of Arena Masters led by the Host.

The game will feature various PvP and PvE game modes, ratings, weapon and gear unlocks and unique features for owners of the main Escape from Tarkov game, like the ability to play as your main profile character.

name: Galactic Center for Etymological Research
description: You goal is to map out planets in different systems. You do so by receiving a word representing a name and swapping letters until you get other possible words with the same letters, which unlock upgrades or new locations.

name: Super Meteor
description: Can "Super Meteor" save the universe from the space debris created by the development of space by the people of Earth?

name: Synthwave Fury
description: Speed and fight your way across an endless highway of neon lights and synthetic palm trees in this virtual world of pure retro '80s nostalgia.

name: Estrus Princess
description: Estrus Princess is an exploratory RPG without combat. It's a story about a princess heading into estrus looking for a future king in the city.

name: Succubus Dating
description: What do you do when you find out your date is a succubus? Either run away or...

name: Russian Hunter
description: Russian Hunter is the most realistic hunting simulator you've ever seen!

name: Isolate Me!
description: An exciting survival game with roguelike elements in which you have to play as a police officer in a city engulfed by a pandemic, look for infected people and isolate them, manage the budget and hire police officers, set up vaccination centers and propaganda stands.

name: Splait Rage
description: Arm yourself with your trusty pistol and clear the unknown territory from enemies! Be careful, ammo is limited, there are many traps and evil enemies everywhere. Can you handle them in this unusual platformer/shooter hybrid?

name: Cave Buster
description: Underground action platformer with a silly alien.

name: Dress Cake
description: Dress Cake cordially invites you to the Candy Kingdom Ball! Coralina has been waiting all her life for this event. When her Fairy Godmother answers the call, she reveals her wand has been broken. But Coralina won't be swayed! Take destiny into your own hands on a fantastical trip through Candy Kingdom to find the perfect, exquisite candy dress. Mouth-watering fashion awaits in Dress Cake!

name: Buck Bradley 2
description: Everything is useful Pick up anything you can find into your bag. You'll be surprised with how useful they can be. It will help you make new friends, avoid danger or simply get free stuff.

name: Dwarven Towers
description: The dwarves are forced now to build towers and every time one of the witches casts a spell one of the dwarves is turned into a frog. heir only hope is to build as many towers as possible and score enough magical points.

name: Villwars
description: Villars is a real-time strategy game. Control your troops and reach the very center of the enemy lands! Defend your lands, attack and think over the battle strategy depending on the terrain and position.

name: Down the Drain
description: Take a trip below the sink with Marta in this top-down 2D shooter through randomly generated mazes of pipes. Defeat gooey enemies, overcome strong bosses, and learn what's really going on when trouble starts brewing beneath our tubs and under our streets.

name: Infinity Dungeons
description: Sin descripción

name: DarkSelf: Other Mind
description: DarkSelf: Other Mind is a first-person psichological horror game about the growth of darkness over time. Explore the house, life and mind of John Parse. Complete puzzles inside the mind of John Parse to unlock his memories, and don't let the DarkSelf catch you.

name: Evangeline's Defense
description: The game that mixes the mechanics of Top Down shooters with those of Tower Defense. Collect materials, build your defenses and kill as many demons as you can as you move freely around the world and defend the Archangel Evangeline in this fearless adventure

name: Dead Zone
description: Dead Zone is a multiplayer first and third person survival shooter. Your task is to survive within a closed area filled with many enemies.

name: TDS: War Games
description: TDS: War Games is a fast paced, local 2-4 player split-screen shooter where you and your friends competitively combat each other over the objective set. Customize your player loadout, choose an arena, setup a game-mode and start battling. Only the merciless will claim victory.

name: The Forest Prison
description: In 2160, political dissidents were not sentenced directly to death but were sent for 'cognitive and orientation tests' to a prison from which no one had ever escaped alive. This is the story of James Webb, who was sentenced to life in prison.

name: Team Force 2
description: A comic, funny and cute online multiplayer third person shooter game for everyone with fantastic cartoon 3D next generation graphics and captivating gameplay.

name: Kotomasho: I Can't Believe This Neet Guy Turned Into a Magical Girl!
description: A Gameboy Color and Anime inspired adventure game with RPG elements. The protagonist is a neet 21 year old guy who suddenly acquires the Power of Dreams and transforms into a Magical Girl.

name: Arcade Flight
description: You're controlling a plane that is going forward in an infinite and randomized space filled with barriers. Use your reflexes to dodge the incoming barriers in high speed. Collect coins along the way to later spend them in the store section.

name: Qwilight
description: Qwilight is a free BMS/BMSON rhythm game that supports the most features among other rhythm games. It has various game mods, supporting various hardwares, rich online features, great accessibility to make no longer "BMS is difficult" And, it provides community-driven achievements and titles.

name: Xtal
description: XTAL is a hybrid TPS/Hack 'n' Slash set in an arcane world. Fight off enemies corrupted by an unknown power and explore evocative and mysterious landscapes. Upgrade your arsenal and make use of a forgotten technology to discover the fate of a kingdom in ruin.

name: Master of Knights: Seven Trials
description: Sin descripción

name: Aluna Rift
description:
Illuminate the void of space as you hunt Colossal Bosses in an upgradable time-bending spacecraft. Fly solo or co-op across endless procedural galaxies, or battle each other in PvP. Features challenging survival modes, ultra-wide screen support, global leaderboards and more!

Aluna Rift is a challenging top-down shooter with single player, co-operative and PvP game modes. The game is filled with vibrant visuals, addictive action and scintillating sounds. The main game mode is a mixture between wave-based enemies, random encounter minigames, and hunting colossal bosses. In addition there is an ‘Endless Survival’ mode akin to classic shoot ‘em ups from the golden age of arcade gaming.

name: Reptile Breeder
description: Sin descripción

name: Peter Rabbit: Hidden World
description:
Search for hidden objects in the world of Peter Rabbit
Introducing the second Peter Rabbit game by Poppin Games, creators of hit app Peter Rabbit's Garden (over 3 million downloads)!
Search for hidden objects in cute illustrations that faithfully recreate the style of the original books.

name: Tofu Girl
description: Tofu Girl is a casual game developed by JoyPac. Tofu Girl is a casual game in which a little girl attempts to climb as high as she can through a tofu tower. Mission will be to assist her in completing this amusing task.

name: Anxiety Wires
description: An exploration game about fears and how they can hold us, but, most importantly, about the journey of a person who tries to get rid of those distressing feelings that fear can cause.

name: March March!
description: March! March! is a turn-based auto battler with puzzle-based mechanics, inspired by the classic puzzle game Tetris Each turn your army gets a regiment that varies in formation and size. Tell your units where to march! march! and they will do the rest.

name: Drifting Kings
description: Drifting Kings is Stylized Arcade offline/online Drifting/Touge/Gymkhana racing game with a colorful and stylized environments. fun to play ,hard to master.

name: Solara: Starlight Horizon
description: Solara: Starlight Horizon is a multiplayer space dogfighting game. Fight, explore, trade, smuggle contraband, mine, craft, and undertake missions to gain favor with various factions throughout the universe. Earn credits, upgrade your ship, purchase new spacecraft, and explore a sci fi sandbox.

name: 1000 Hidden Snails
description:
Hidden object game in a surreal style. Extremely hard!

1000 hidden snails is a hidden object game in a surreal setting.
Black and white hand-drawn graphics in a cartoon style.

Can you find 1000 snails? Just click on the snail!
Good Luck!

name: Rescue Quest Gold: Collector's Edition
description: The hit match-3 game is back! Join Boom and Zap on their fantasy adventure in Rescue Quest Gold, lovingly remastered as a premium game with more levels, enhanced effects, and improved gameplay.

name: Hiddenverse: Ariadna Dreaming
description: Ariadna finally gained enough power to unite all the worlds into one whole, but she does not even suspect that this will lead to disastrous consequences.

name: Dark Frontiers
description:
“Dark Frontiers” is the newest, gamified space realm governed by a Gamestarter produced DAO. As NFT standards and values are shifting towards promoting use-cases, Dark Frontiers’ goal is to drive mainstream adoption by enhancing the usability of NFTs through staking, item ownership, and the creation of real-world value through in-game items.

Embarking on the gamified metaverse, players will pilot their own spaceship and conquer new planets, defeat oppositions, form guilds and capture new and unique NFTs that can either be built on or sold on the open markets.

The $DARK token in Dark Frontiers will cover an array of opportunities. For players interested in dominating entire sections of a universe, say, by owning a moon, or a planet, they can use this digital plot of land to earn interest on their $DARK. The token will not only be used for staking, but players can also purchase and upgrade their starship Galactica’s using $DARK. After upgrading your ship for universal domination, you are prepared to stand head-to-head with other opponents that are in your way!

name: Acclimate
description: Explore, gather, and manage resources to develop the capabilities to build and survive. Your survival rests on your ability to cast aside your opposition to technology and become technologically advanced.

name: King of Kalimpong
description: You're a fast-moving minivan with a projectile weapon in this Online Multiplayer PvP Battle Arena. Shoot rocks at your friends and capture their flag. Boost, jump, dodge, and flip to survive. Block projectiles with well-timed kicks, and smash other vehicles to bits when they get in your way.

name: Project Angels
description: In the 2050s, the Steel Waters security company and Angels are the only answer to the growing threat of maritime piracy in Red Tide Waters. Follow the story through the eyes of Steel Waters Commander-in-Chief and uncover the truth behind the strongest pirate congregation; Apollyon.

name: Rainbow Tap
description: Rainbow Tap is a fresh new style music & rhythm game. It has 4 modes easy, medium, map and surfing with 16 songs in the first version of release. Go check out and enjoy this fresh new style of game tapping with the music & rhythm! Use ASDJKL to play a hit or just tap the screen if it's touchscreen.

name: Overage
description: Overage is a satirical fast-paced shooter set in a horrific 2.5D environment; your only goal is to kill as many demons as you can, in the most violent ways imaginable, using the most overpowered guns possible! Yes, you can craft a gun that shoots electric guitars.

name: Project Impulse
description: Project Impulse is a VR movement shooter where you can climb anything and all interactions are physics based. Jump and slide to keep your momentum to gain an advantage over your enemies!

name: Total War: Warhammer III - Immortal Empires
description: Immortal Empires is a grand-scale campaign mode for Total War: WARHAMMER III available for free to owners of all three Total War: WARHAMMER titles. It combines the landmasses, Legendary Lords, war units, and more from the series into one colossal mode spread across the vast Warhammer World

name: Pipoclub
description: In Pipoclub you will find the most successful children's educational games, created for children from all over the world. The games are available in Online version, downloads, Apps or physical support. Free games can be used without registration.

name: Moonscape
description:
Moonscape is a resource strategy management DeFi game that takes place on a futuristic moon. Players scramble for limited resources to develop their burgeoning cities.

In the quest for domination, players can plunder rival cities and collaborate with friendly ones. City-building uses tried-and-tested DeFi mechanics, some employing the use of NFTs.

name: Farwoods
description: A world of storybook roleplaying inspired by works like Redwall and Ironclaw. Join a player-driven living world of fantasy and adventure, contribute to the player-run economy, and help contribute to the organic narratives created by the community.

name: Down Fall
description: Down Fall is a battle royal where only the zone can kill you. Use weapons to damage and knock other players out of the zone. Multiple procedural generated levels give you the opportunity to stay safe at the top or venture down for better items and more risk.

name: I Was Lost
description: Move walls, avoid danger in a labyrinthic poem, and create your own stories in this unique puzzle experience where each level is a poem's verse unraveling as you progress. Control not only your position but also move walls to create new paths and escape from seemingly impossible situations.

name: Old Skies
description: A time travel adventure spanning two hundred years! Dive into the past with time agent Fia Quinn as she embarks on seven trips through time. History is up for grabs, from the speakeasies of Prohibition to the vicious gangs of the Gilded Age to the World Trade Center on September 10, 2001.

name: Family Feud Cartridge #2
description: Sin descripción

name: Roboholic
description: Roboholic is a roguelite FPS with wacky physics and even wackier abilities. An ex-farmer turned robot is resurrected over and over again in order to defeat a crazed warlord leading an army of genetically modified soldiers and malfunctioning droids.

name: Chern
description: Action with RPG elements from beginners of the game industry, Gamega Games studios.

name: Suffer
description: Do you have any regrets?

name: TypeRush
description: TypeRush brings typing racers together! Compete against other talented typists around the globe.

name: Hollow Park
description: A short first-person horror-action game/aesthetic experience.

name: Field
description:
Nothing is after you.
Nothing will jump out at you.
There are no sudden loud noises.

That doesn't mean everything is okay.

name: Nick Extreme Sports
description: A cancelled Nickelodeon game for the HyperScan.

name: Tetris.com
description: Tetris.com was a handheld released in Japan. It featured an infrared sensor for multiplayer use and message function.

name: Mail Mole: Collector's Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Tetris Classic
description: Tetris Classic for Windows is an enhanced version of the previously released game for DOS.

name: 4D Miner
description: 4D Miner is a 4-dimensional survival sandbox game that allows players to explore an infinite, randomly-generated, 4-dimensional world.

name: Project Household
description: Sin descripción

name: The Sky Left Us
description: The Sky Left Us is a sci-fi visual novel about climate crisis, classism, and how relationships shape our politics. Play as Spire Risan, an off-worlder scientist who becomes entangled in the drama of a mountain they came here to save. Fall in with the denizens of the three castes, and find that things are more complicated than they seem: be it love, family, or the systems that shape us.

name: Digimon Super Rumble
description: Digimon Franchise, Turn Based, MMORPG

name: Virtually Board Snowboarding 2
description: Virtually Board Snowboarding 2 is a cancelled snowboarding for the N-Gage.

name: Highpoint
description: Grab your friends and hit the court in HIGHPOINT - a competitive multiplayer game mixing energetic sports scoring with the physicality of a brawler! Build your own Bot baller in a world of endless summer vibes and lighthearted competition!

name: Roses Will Rise
description:
A tyrant's campaign has torn the kingdoms within Shanur apart. Firalda, a blacksmith's apprentice, seeks revenge for her father's death with the help of a plague doctor, a saint princess and a witch, raising hell within the castle they are imprisoned in.

Storm the castle with only four units in a strategy RPG with visual novel elements.

name: Sega Archives from USA Vol. 3
description: Sega Archives from USA Vol. 3 is a compilation of seven Mega Drive games, emulated for the PC in Japan. It has the same games as Sega Smash Pack 2 except Sega Swirl. It marks the first time Vectorman 2 was released in Japan (and possibly outside the US in general).

name: Muga
description: Sin descripción

name: Coby Portable DVD Player
description: The TF-DVD560 is a portable DVD player released in 2006, manufactured by Coby with 12 built-in Sega Game Gear and Master System games. It has a 3.5 inch TFT screen and runs off an AC adapter, car adapter or lithium ion battery. The games are emulated using console-on-a-chip hardware licensed from AtGames.

name: Micro Drive Festa
description: The Micro Drive Festa is a portable Sega Mega Drive clone console from Micro Drive brand manufactured by Cyber Toy for Russian markets.

name: Handheld Electronic Games
description: The Handheld Electronic Games by Coleco, also known as the Portable Player by PlayPal and Pocket Gear by Mediatronic, a handheld device containing 20 Sega Master System and Sega Game Gear titles.

name: Toraware no Kan
description: You woke up in the forest with amnesia. Without a cellphone, a hand bruise mark on your arm and a pack of medicine in your pocket, you search around for help. As you went into a mansion for help, a mystery man appeared before you and tell you to run away before it's too late...

name: Arcade Master Deluxe
description: The Arcade Master Deluxe is a console on a chip manufactured by AtGames. It is a console built into an arcade stick, with a directional stick, six face buttons and 26 built-in Sega Mega Drive games. It has no cartridge slot, but can run games via SD cards.

name: Smashing Star
description: Smashing Star is a 1v1 Catapult Battle game. Players drag characters to catapult and hit enemies while graffitiing the battleground. The player who gets more graffiti done wins the game.

name: GenMobile
description: The GenMobile is a handheld "console on a chip" manufactured by AtGames and distributed by Hyperkin. It was officially licensed by Sega. Like the Sega Nomad and the Retro Gen, it can play Sega Genesis and Sega Mega Drive cartridges. Unlike both consoles, it features 20 built-in games. It has a built-in 2.4 inch LCD screen but can also be connected to a TV set. It is compatible with cartridges of all regions and ships with a built-in rechargeable battery pack. Its design resembles that of a PlayStation Portable and comes in black and blue.

name: Weddle
description:
Guess the NFL player in as few tries as possible
After each guess, the color of the tiles will change depending on how close your guess was to the player
In any column, green represents a match
In the division column, yellow represents the correct conference but not the correct division
In the height, age, and weight column, yellow represents that the correct number is within 2 (inches, years, numbers) of the player

name: Arcade Legends: OutRun 2019
description: The Arcade Legends OutRun 2019, known in the US as the Play TV Legends Outrun 2019, is a Sega Mega Drive "console on a chip" designed and manufactured by Radica under license from Sega Toys. It is a consolised version of OutRun 2019.

name: Arcade Gamer
description: Sin descripción

name: Arcade Gamer
description:
The Arcade Gamer, also known as the Poga and as the Master System Portátil in Brazil, is a Sega Master System and Sega Game Gear console on a chip manufactured by AtGames.

The Arcade Gamer has been distributed by several companies under different names and colour schemes, in both 20 and 30 game variants. All share the same plastic shell - a controller (also seen with the Mega Drive Twin Pads) with an extra C button, despite no Master System or Game Gear games ever making use of it. The same shell was used for the Mega Drive-based Arcade Gamer Classic.

name: Arcade Gamer Classic
description: Sin descripción

name: Arcade Gamer Classic
description: The 15 games version of the Arcade Gamer Classic.

name: Arcade Gamer Classic
description: The Arcade Gamer Classic is a Mega Drive "console on a chip" originally produced by AtGames for the Asian market with 10-20 built-in games and distributed in the UK by Blaze Europe and France by H&B. It is similar to the Mega Drive Twin Pads, except it consists of a single pad. The number of built-in games varies between releases.

name: Arcade Ultimate Portable Video Game Player
description: This version has 18 games instead of the original 20, having some of them replaced by Streets of Rage and Super Street Fighter II: The New Challengers.

name: Arcade Ultimate: Street of Rage - Limited Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Arcade Ultimate Portable
description: The Blaze version changes Ristar for Sonic the Hedgehog: Spinball.

name: Sega Mega Drive Portable Video Game Player: Streets of Rage Special Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Sega Mega Drive Portable Video Game Player
