description: The screen looks 3D! I can see it! Do you have "stereoscopic vision"? The way to do it is to look at your hand as if you were looking at the distance. If you are not sure, ask a nearby teacher or adult. When you start the game, the stereoscopic view begi…

name: Love of Magic Book 2: The War
description: Love of Magic is an Adult Visual Novel / RPG set in an Arthurian Urban Fantasy world. You've found True Love, you've glimpsed your Destiny. Now it's time to wage the War you were born to fight. Book 2: The War continues the story of the Knights of the Lake from Book 1: The Crown.

name: EasyChemistryLab
description: Are you trying to learn chemical formulas or want to test your chemical knowledge and memory? this game is the right one for you! Get in and play to learn many chemical formulas and it's uses!

name: Pickup One
description: This is an parkour pickup game. The pace of the game is very tight. The goal of the game is to score as many points as possible.

name: Gliderman
description: Gliderman is an open-world flight game where you play as a little glider trying to explore the randomly generated world around you. Pull off stunts and chase your highscore!

name: Cubiti Parti
description: Competitive Online Party Game! Master fun minigames in real-time online multiplayer action against your friends!

name: Deliria
description: Deliria is a multiplayer 5v1 horror/social deception game where a player is chosen at random to take on the role of a Hunter. The other remaining Players must work to survive and eventually escape the Hunter.

name: Empire of Sin: Expansion 2
description: The second expansion for Empire of Sin includes new game mechanics, missions, and powerful characters that come to visit Chicago. The question is, will you let them stay?

name: SCP: New Operative
description: SCP: New Operative is a Multiplayer Horror FPS game based on SCP - Containment Breach. Escape and carry your team to victory! Can you survive a containment Breach within the depths of the SCP Foundation?

name: Crazy Zoo
description: "Crazy Zoo" is a small animal-themed match-3 game. The game is simple and easy to use, suitable for playing for a while in your spare time.

name: Graviteam Tactics: Mius Front - Predators in the Mist
description: In September 1943, under the pressure of the Steppe and Voronezh fronts, units of the German AG Kempf were forced to withdraw from Kharkov in a southwestern direction to Poltava and further to the Dnieper. The Soviet command is deploying 1MC to pursue the enemy and continue the offensive...

name: The Last City
description: Sin descripción

name: Good Luck Have Fun
description: A Platformer that sends you back to the start upon death, and times you while you play. Can you make it to the last island, and through the finish line? Or will the obstacles be to difficult for you to overcome.

name: Dissension
description: Embark on an undercover mission in a medieval kingdom hovering on the brink of a civil war. Become part of a vile conspiracy or choose to act against your orders. Stand by your unlikely allies or ruin them for personal gain. The fate of the divided realm rests in your hands.

name: Round Table
description: Round Table is a fun virtual reality action game for everyone! You are a knight of King Arthur's Round Table practicing swordplay. The wizard Merlin has conjured up a training course for you in King Arthur's throne room. Grab a sword and get to it. How many rounds of Merlin's parcour can you do?

name: Spider-Man 4
description:
Spider-Man 4 is an unreleased Wii game developed by Eurocom. The game was intended to be a tie-in game for the movie Spider-Man 4, however it was cancelled due to the cancellation of the movie.

The game has since been released online in 2020, after a prototype was found on a RVT-H Wii development kit.

name: Corgi
description: A fascinating platformer about a space dog - a traveler who ended up on a strange planet, plowing the endless expanses of space.

name: Walk to the Woods
description: Ever walk into nature with your friends and just chat? Walk to the Woods captures that feeling by asking deep and thoughtful questions while you stare up at the stars together. Some questions change every time they're asked. Some will make you laugh. Some will make you cry.

name: Spellarium 8 Match 3 Puzzle
description: That's not your regular Match3 game! It is a Match3 Puzzle. Part 8 has a new bonus game and a new gameplay you won't see in other Match 3 games.

name: Simple Simulation
description: This is a simulated business game in the form of cards

name: NoWayBack
description: No way out is a cartoon style third person shooting game. You need to play the main character of the game, chicken bro, who is forced to move forward because the 'W' of keyboard is pressed by the headset. Defeat the enemy, get speed and overcome different levels with different mechanisms.

name: Panic Floor!!
description: An extremely unforgiving and constrained precision oriented platformer with fast paced flow!!

name: The Otherwilde
description: A gorgeous world of photorealistic natural assets, cute villages, and unexpected NPCs. Explore the open world map, gather herbs, create potions, hunt wild animals, build bases, and farm. Currently Early Access.

name: Water Me!
description: Indie 3D puzzle-platform adventure where you play as a water and change states to solve puzzles, find collectibles, create gardens, learn about flower cultures and save the world one plant at a time.

name: Space Molmae
description: There's a lot of time waiting for LOL and DOTA, right? That's when MOLMAE Time!

name: Love In a Bottle
description: Ankora the Love Demon only has a month to prove she can live on her own, but the cute single ladies in her area might turn out to be a distraction! Can she settle down and find love?!

name: Chronicle of Forgotten Times: Pawn of the Gods
description: The kingdom of Ayderia is going through terrible times, people suffer from hunger and disease, and at this time the feudal lords are at each other’s throats in the struggle for influence and power.

name: Kisekimura: ZumiIwa
description: This DLC adds Skjema, new missions and gems to the world of Kisekimura.

name: Resistance 204X
description: Fight against other players locally or cross-play online on this fast-paced footsies-based 2D fighting game. Block! Poke! Jump! Grab! Hit & Confirm at the right moment. Make combos and special attacks without bleeding your thumb. Run and reach the end of the stage to win the match. Rollback Netcode.

name: Gas Station Simulator: Shady Deals
description: The uncle is back! And he has a new business on his mind… Build new things on your gas station and make some shady deals!

name: Lock & Key: A Magical Girl Mystery
description: Lock and Key: A Magical Girl Mystery is a romantic thriller starring a married couple of former Magical Girls. Along with and old friend and a new protégé, they'll undertake one last journey to free Chicago from the terrifying grip of a mysterious serial killer.

name: Blink God
description: You must climb to the top of the world using a unique teleport called Blink. so... do you like bungee jumping?

name: Shadow Angel
description: This game is a domestic third person RPG action soul game with female protagonists. In the process of fighting against the dark forces, you will continue to become stronger. Use multiple skills flexibly to defeat the enemy in bloody battle.

name: Wanba Warriors: Character Pack 5
description: This pack includes 4 new playable characters. They are: Water Monkey Sea ​Anemone Erkui Grass

name: Cyber Sweep
description: Mines are randomly distributed. Find where they are by removing blocks. Beacons will guide you by showing how many adjacent Mines there are, if any. You win when all Mines have either been surrounded or have been removed. Be careful not hit a Mine!

name: Unoffensible
description: A VR only sci-fi RTS towerdefence game where you are outnumbered, but overpowered. Towering over the battlefield you will physically interact with everything in the game for an intuitive experience.

name: Vintage Records from Hell
description: Ever dream of running your own Heavy Metal Record Store? How about having the most amazing Vintage Vinyl collection? If so, dear metalhead, this game was made just for you.

name: Mailbag for a Tattered Nation
description: An interactive poem.

name: Another Generic Space Shooter
description: It's anything but...

name: Stardust Arena
description: Stardust Arena is a fast paced, chaotic and difficult arcade shooter set in the distant future. An asteroid mining unit finds themself in an intergalactic battle arena, most likely against their will. The only way out is to fight to the death for the entertainment of the local supercluster!

name: Father: The Truth
description:
You just woke up on a dark rainy evening, your parents have gone out for dinner and you're home alone.

But is that the truth? What has happened in this house while you were asleep? What are the secrets that lay hidden within this house?

Find out in this short, retro horror game inspired by video games from 90's combined with semi realistic lighting, a dark moody atmosphere and plenty of tension evoking moments!

name: Flood Runner 5
description: Flood runner 5 is the fifth game in the very popular Flood Runner series. This game has added all the improvements from the previous games but has also added improvements of it’s own to make it one of the best games in the series.

name: Plank Road
description: "Plank road simulation" is a game that allows you to enjoy easy and free simulation of plank road construction. By following the construction method of Chinese traditional frame structure and combining various building elements, To create our own legendary plank road journey.

name: Square Journey
description: Square Journey is a minimalist arcade game that aims to help Square reach the depths of his inner dungeon in search of a greater understanding of himself.

name: Jelly Forest
description: Help the cube jump over the steep rocks and get as far as possible before he loses all his three hearts

name: Dreadful Hours
description: Dreadful Hours is a fast paced time managing survival horror game where multiple creatures are trying to attack you at every point. You must watch the cameras and then decide your next moves while using as little power as possible.

name: Apparitions
description: Apparitions is a 4 player co-op ghost hunting game. Figure out how to communicate with the other side. Use the equipment to find out what type of ghost you and you're team are dealing with and determine how to exorcise it accordingly or help it pass on peacefully.

name: Bonelords
description: Build up yourself & your defenses in Bonelords! Defend against waves of enemies! Attack using a large variety of weapons & tools! Scale your power, and face the great hordes of Spegroon!

name: Ragdoll Funhouse
description: Play a fully physical, humanoid ragdoll and explore a indoor funhouse. Swing from ropes on the ceiling, make your way up climbing walls, or be bounced about by rollers. Test your mastery of our physical controls in the time trials around the map, or just enjoy your time challenging the obstacles.

name: Piggy Jump
description: Here is the Hardest game ever made! Game about Piggy, who is a basketball player with a dream to defeat everyone. Jump, Dodge, Dunk and Fly with Piggy to complete all 45 Levels and mini games. Piggy Jump is a big challenge for thos who like difficult games!

name: Automata Ecosystem: Cellular Automata Simulation
description: Turning cellular automata into an audiovisual experience. Automata Ecosystem is a GPU-powered cellular automata simulation with complex interactions and procedural audio generation.

name: MonGirl Expedition
description: Jack’s simple life ends on his birthday with a surprise. He ends up in an unknown land full of monster girls with a task from the Goddess herself. Will he be able to impress her? Duke it out in dynamic real-time combat, solve puzzles, meet girls, and conquer their hearts!

name: ParaPerspective
description: ParaPerspective is a stylish and minimalist puzzle game where your perspective affects how the world works. Help the little guys get to their destination by rotating the camera and directing them through seemingly impossible geometry.

name: Goddess of Card War 2
description: "Goddess of Card War 2" is a card game with classical Chinese graphics. Each card has different skills and attributes. Players need to collect more cards to grow their team.

name: Momentum
description: Momentum is a 2 KB highscore chaser about amassing nukes

name: Kedama's Adventure
description: A Story about Kedama in Gensokyo. This is a fan game basedon Touhou Project.

name: Refuge: Into the Unknown
description: In the Industrial Age, forced to work cleaning chimneys from Birmingham's houses, a boy named George decides to run away from his shelter into the unknown hoping to find a better place to live. Help him getting away from the city and face the challenges that will be found in the journey.

name: Dark Slime
description: Go through a huge number of caves, solve many puzzles, and fight against the strongest enemies!

name: One
description: In the world of "One" Action Third Person Shooter, fighters with enhanced combat suit get bigger and stronger for every kill they get.

name: CinemApocalypse
description: In CinemApocalypse, you have the choice of simply watching a movie on your Big Screen VR, or playing survival mode, and trying to save as many citizens as possible.

name: Maid Idle
description: You are now a tavern owner in an incredible magical world filled with wonderful maids to hire! Each one is ready to have lots of fun and new experiences with you! Are you ready to manage all of her hearts?

name: Old Gods
description: It looks like you have died. But neither heaven nor hell await you. Assigned a fate from the two creators you will be sent back to life with the task of overthrowing the false gods. Exciting fights, difficult puzzles and a colorful world of different creatures await you.

name: Best of Eleven
description: Puzzle game about finding patterns. Create your own set or randomize the rules to explore almost unlimited amount of gameplays.

name: Bioxotica
description: Cultivate an exotic homestead - Bioxotica! Grow a ranch of peculiar plants and collectible creatures. Create structures and grand habitats. Will you discover the secrets of this wild land and create a flourishing settlement for the inhabitants on this exotic frontier?

name: Babushka's Glitch Dungeon Crystal
description: Hi so much! You are a little old lady who needs to clean up a big magical cellar. Learn colorful mind-bending spells, or just hit stuff with your broom.

name: Super Arkanoid
description: "Super Arkanoid" is a relatively relaxing casual game. The player controls a horizontal board to block the falling ball.

name: King
description: This is a game that combines strategy, tactics and role-playing. You travel to a magical world and become a king. You will manage your own country and conquer the world through diplomacy and war.

name: Contrast
description: Death is inconsequential in this arcade-style roguelite with an artstyle inspired by early Atari consoles. But be careful with damaging the bloodied walls and floors, falling out of the level will bring you right back to the start of the stage.

name: Galaxy Citizen: Beginning
description: You are heir to the empire,struggling to survive in the dark age in the galaxy.Fight against the Emperor. Galaxy Citizen is an Action RPG set in Space Opera world .Free to Play

name: Pumpkin head
description: This game is a side-scrolling 2D action shooting game created with dot pictures. Control the main character, Pumpkin Head, as he runs through various stages such as the sea and the desert while battling the slime army!

name: Simon the Sorcerer Origins
description: Simon The Sorcerer Origins is the official prequel of the legendary Simon's adventure saga. Simon will return for the first time to the absurd world of the Sorcerers unleashing an ancient prophecy and gaining ancient magical powers. Prepare to experience a classic adventure in a modern way!

name: The Misanthropic Girl
description: You control two protagonists at the same time in this action RPG, letting you combine their unique skills. Explore and discover in the seamless open world setting of a detailed Japanese town as you watch these two high schoolers learn what “existence” really means in this post-apocalyptic tale.

name: Demonoire
description: Demonoire - A heroic 2D shooter, Rescue Senvil from the forces of evil.

name: TetriStory 110%
description: Sin descripción

name: Mechanical Sunset
description: A catastrophe is looming on the horizon -- threatening the existence of the Walking City of Machines, home to thousands of robots. You are its last hope, and the only solution is through machinery.

name: Democracy 4: Voting Systems
description: Frustrated that your voters seem too influenced by corporate donations? Eager to lower the minimum voting age? Perhaps you would like to ban election robo-calls, or maybe go the other direction and make corporate donations unlimited? All your voting and campaign problems are solved with this DLC!

name: Demons Crusher
description: Demons crusher is a side-scrolling platform slasher.

name: Memorabilia
description: Find notes and clues that will lead to memories. Change the present by manipulating your past. You must save your childhood friend in order to escape the mansion of memories.

name: Belarus Simulator: Preemptive Strike
description: You are the ruler of a democratic independent state of Belarus. Unfortunately, you receive troubled news. An act of aggression is planned against your country. You need to do everything in your power to stop it.

name: Cave VR
description: Cave is the original VR puzzle game, looking for a journey of exploration in the ancient mysterious cave ruins, the ruins of the ancient inhabitants are from the exit ruins in layers, and the horse-hunting treasure hunt on the road seems to imply on.

name: Castle Greyrot
description: Castle Greyrot is a challenging boss-rush rogue-lite turn-based RPG that revolves around killing brutal bosses, a lot. Train your party members to overcome the horrors of Castle Greyrot and its unending curse... If you can!

name: TS Marketplace: CSX Scenario Pack 02
description: Now, CSX Scenario Pack 02, from developer High Iron Simulations, brings the drama and diversity of CSX railroading to Train Simulator with ten authentic career scenarios that re-create the railroading of CSX and its predecessors on three popular Train Simulator routes!

name: War Commander
description: Super shocking military strategy game world! Lots of weapons and combat effects. Collect more advanced commanders and build weapons and equipment. Loot resources, build military units, and pass various interesting levels. Legion battle, you can attack other players.

name: Beat! After the Summer
description: Spread your wings, after the summer sky.

name: The Twilight of Infinity Episode 2 - Attack on the Hydro Processor
description: An explosion in 2041 will lead to an investigation at the Mesa Hydro Processor. Why would anyone blow up a civilian facility, and who could be behind it?

name: Ares Virus2
description: The "Ares Virus" series of games is widely acclaimed for its unique combat and individual style of painting. Now that the sequel is back, it will give you an unprecedented experience.

name: A-Mazing Enigmas
description: After venturing into the Trials of Old, help three characters traverse puzzle rooms using the world and the skills unique to each one of them. Guide them to the end of these trails and get the treasures that are held within.

name: Arth Island
description: Gather resources, set up a camp, choose your class, level up your skills, don't die of cold or starvation and battle the other failed experiments to survive as long as possible on this procedurally generated island

name: Bark
description: Bark is a psychological/survival horror experience from the perspective of a small, innocent Jack-Russel Terrier living in an abusive household. Maintain your instinctual needs and desires as you try desperately to escape the house in which you have been forced to call home.

name: Cursed Travels: Sunken City
description: A dark puzzle game featuring intriguing mysteries, a unique artstyle, and skeletons. Platform your way through haunted forests, cursed ruins, dark mountains, and more, searching for the mythical Sunken City to solve its ancient puzzles.

name: Second Soul
description:
Aphwoakah is very lonely, Aphwoakah wants to make friends. Help Aphwoakah find some friends, so Aphwoakah isn't lonely anymore.

Go on an epic journey across the valley in search of friends for Aphwoakah.

Meet many unique, exciting potential friends.

Encounter thrilling places in which friends may be found.

name: Nuclear Rush
description: Nuclear Rush is an unreleased Sega Mega Drive tank combat game for use with the Sega VR headset, developed by FutureScape Productions and slated to be published by Sega. Intended to be the hardware’s pack-in game, it features gameplay similar to Battlezone and Stellar-Fire.

name: Youngblood: Search and Destroy
description: Youngblood: Search and Destroy is an isometric action game that was originally scheduled for being published for PC and Sony PlayStation in November 1997. However, the PC version has been postponed to May 1998 while the PlayStation version was pushed back to an undisclosed date.

name: Untitled One
description: Untitled One is a Yume Nikki fangame. You explore Sydney's dreams when you fall asleep.

name: Drunk As I Like: Gensokyo Chugging Contest
description:
Compete in a frantic drinking competition against Gensokyo's residents,
try to keep your arms steady so you don't spill anything!

name: Remedy
description: Remedy is an English fangame made by Isasapiens. You play as Hareta, a girl stuck in her bedroom. In the protagonist's bedroom there are two medicine bottles, one of which she must use before sleeping. You will be taken to one of the two main dream worlds based on which medicine you took before sleeping. Remedy is a traditional fangame, with the goal being to explore and find effects.

name: Grand Theft Auto: Anime
description: Grand Theft Auto: Anime is an unlicensed mod of Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas that changes the game to be based around various anime, with edits to the character models, audio and the overall map.

name: Tower of Hell
description: Take on the challenge and experience high-tension platforming action in Tower Of Hell! Jump your way upward in your quest for freedom, but be careful: A single wrong jump can mean a high drop downward.... and there's long way down...

name: Mega Drive Twin Pads
description: The Mega Drive Twin Pads is a Mega Drive "console on a chip" originally produced by AtGames for the Asian market with 5 built-in games and distributed in Europe by Blaze Europe with 10 games. One of the two game controllers plugs directly into a television, however it will only output a PAL signal. There is no cartridge slot, so you are limited to the 10 games. Four AA batteries are needed to operate the console.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog Chaos & Spinball
description: Sonic the Hedgehog Chaos & Spinball is one of the plug in play games created by Techno Source. It requires 3 AA batteries. Two games are included, which are Sonic Chaos and Sonic Spinball.

name: Ampere
description:
On a night in 1898 a whole City turned pitch dark. As a young girl you know that you shouldn’t play frivolously with electricity. But this time you find yourself alone in the dark. Bravely, you’re taking the task to reconnect the power.

Discover the secrets of the underground city as you enlighten it one room after another. Can you face the shadows and return the light?

name: FunPlay 20-in-1
description: Freetron's FunPlay 20-in-1, is a Plug and Play game console released in 2009, licensed by Atgames (who exclusively manages Sega's first party platform game library), and manufactured and distributed by Freetron. It's very similar in design to PlayPal Plug & Play (including the same button layout) and by being a Sega Master System / Game Gear emulator. Though they share a significant number of games, they differ by using 3 AAA batteries and a directional pad instead of a joystick.

name: Arcade Legends: Sega Genesis Volume 3 - Super Sonic Gold
description: Arcade Legends: Sega Genesis Volume 3 is a game console which is part of the Play TV Legends series. There is no cartridge port but four games are available which include: Sonic the Hedgehog, Sonic the Hedgehog 2, Sonic Spinball, and Dr. Robotnik's Mean Bean Machine.

name: Merge Clash
description: Merge Clash is an awesome tower defense game where you build and deploy dozens of unique and powerful towers to defend your castle. Fight off endless waves of enemies in competitive multiplayer or in Co-op. But remember! Combining towers has an equal chance of increasing your power, or creating a random merged tower!

In Picnic Penguin you can push multiple blocks at a time and rearrange them to open the path and complete the levels. Picnic Penguin is a real treat to enjoy in your spare time! Picnic Penguin features several worlds to unlock with a huge variation of puzzles to solve while finding coins to collect all the skins on the gashapon machine.

description: A world-renowned painting has been stolen! Help Francesca find the masterpiece and convict the culprit! The luxury cruise ship, The Empire, is boarded by rich tourists, a world-renowned art-exhibition, and a thief. Soon the highlight of the exhibition is stolen and Francesca di Porta, the famous detective, is disturbed in her well-earned holiday to investigate undercover and prevent a panic among the passengers in Insider Tales: The Stolen Venus 2! Solve the case using your Hidden Object talents.

name: Ancient TriPeaks
description: You can be a novice or an expert, you'll still be able to find your way to make history in this take on the old solitaire favorite, tripeaks.
